alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:28PM MDT until June 20 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR WESTERN OGLALA LAKOTA COUNTY... At 327 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Dry Wood Housing to 3 miles northeast of Slim Buttes Housing to 6 miles west of White Clay, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Number 4, Pine Ridge, Calico, Dry Wood Housing, Wolf Creek Housing, Manderson, Wounded Knee, Goose Neck Housing, Lonesome Valley, Evergreen, Porcupine Butte Housing, Rockyford, Sharps Corner and Thunder Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
